posts.post_title: Wanted:  Lo Grade Raw T206 Cards
posts.post_content:
Wanting to buy groups or singles (1, 2, 5 or more) of T206 cards in lower grade condition.  

Email scans and asking prices to:  [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
